items.sentence: We used to think that that was why this kind of thing happened.
The dress that Mary bought yesterday doesn't fit her very well.
Tom wasn't rescued by a fireman. He was rescued by a policeman.
It was clear from the beginning that it was a terrorist attack.
Lizards are more closely related to humans than to salamanders.
The email that I got from Tom says that he'll arrive on Monday.
I had one more question I was planning to ask, but I forgot to.
We're good friends now, but we didn't like each other at first.
We somehow managed to get home, even though we were very drunk.
You're up very early this morning. Do you have something to do?
